note:
Geographer working at the crossroads of political ecology, environmental justice, and development in Latin America

Currently Assistant Professor of Latin American Studies at University of Florida. Starting new position at Colorado State University in 2023.

Forthcoming book "Disrupting the patrón: Indigenous land rights and the fight for environmental justice in Paraguay's Chaco" with University of California Press in April 2023.

Tereré enthusiast ~ Views my own
